description:
Social distancing, staying at home, more and more festival cancellations... time for some great memories! 😁 .
This selfie with Frank Novinec was taken at Nord Open Air 2018 in Essen, Germany. A very small summer festival with a great atmosphere and always a stunning line-up. 😍 Hatebreed was one of the headliners in 2018. I remember this very hot summer evening with a very sweaty moshpit. 😅🤘 Hatebreed live is always a pleasure. 😁🙏
.
.
.
